Hamas unlikely to reject ceasefire but will demand Israeli withdrawal -sourceHamas is unlikely to reject a Gaza ceasefire proposal it received from mediators this week, but will not sign it without assurances that Israel has committed to ending the war, a Palestinian official close to the talks said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 11:56:30 GMT 6NYF2RHMNZLILOR7QVGVCYQ7FU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-unlikely-reject-ceasefire-will-demand-israeli-withdrawal-source-2024-02-01/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Zelenskiy says EU aid approval will boost Ukraine's economyPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Thursday the EU's approval of an aid package to Ukraine would strengthen long-term economic and financial stability as the war with Russia approaches its third year. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 11:54:19 GMT IIVB5JTIWBMA5GXPOCBDN5Z7QY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-says-eu-aid-approval-will-boost-ukraines-economy-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian court extends pre-trial detention of U.S. journalist KurmashevaA Russian court on Thursday extended the pre-trial detention of Alsu Kurmasheva, a Russian-American journalist who is accused of violating a law on "foreign agents". EU agrees 50 bln euro Ukraine aid package - what are the reactions?European Union leaders unanimously agreed on Thursday to extend 50 billion euros ($53.96 billion)in aid to Ukraine, the chairman of the summit said, overcoming weeks of Hungary's resistance. Georgian ruling party nominates its leader as new prime minister ahead of electionsGeorgia's ruling party on Thursday nominated its blunt-speaking leader Irakli Kobakhidze as prime minister, as the South Caucasus country, which is courted by both Russia and the West, prepares for parliamentary elections. War with Russia? Kremlin says the West is trying to demonise RussiaThe Kremlin said on Thursday that European officials talking up the prospect of a war with Russia were seeking to demonise Moscow as an enemy and warned that the United States would try to make Europe foot the bill for supporting Ukraine. Nayib Bukele: the tough-on-crime former ad man set to secure new El Salvador termIn June 2019, a week after taking office as El Salvador's youngest president in modern history, Nayib Bukele wrote on his Twitter account: "I am officially the coolest president in the world." Exclusive: Iran's Guards pull officers from Syria after Israeli strikesIran's Revolutionary Guards have scaled back deployment of their senior officers in Syria due to a spate of deadly Israeli strikes and will rely more on allied Shi'ite militia to preserve their sway there, five sources familiar with the matter said.
